title: Google Pixel 2 xl replacement Drama any advice
content:
Basically I had problem with my pixel 2 XL I contact customer support and they asked me to send it back for replacement,
when I asked if I sent only the phone or the phone with the box and accessories he said to me everything put in the box and send it back after 2 weeks I received an email saying you replacement is on the way , massive box arrived with small tiny boxs include only the phone I tried to contact Google customer support and now for whole week I can not get this problem resolved I have told once this accessory become available will be send it shortly , 
today I received the first email saying the head jack adaptor it's on the way now imagine there are another 7 item they have to send! do I wait for 7 packages or I have to do something else I can't use the phone right now and I'm really struggling I am feeling frustrating
Any advice
